name: Ultimate Notion Project Manager
description: Introducing the Ultimate Notion Project Manager Template: Streamline Your Project Management Process✅ Notion Certified ✅ - Over 1000 DownloadsDo you want a comprehensive solution to managing your projects all in one place? Look no further than the Ultimate Notion Project Manager template. This powerful tool has been specifically designed to help freelancers, small business owners, and large teams streamline their workflow, track project progress, deadlines, and team assignments with ease.Look no
features: A fully customizable project dashboard to track project progress, deadlines, budgets, roadmaps, metrics, and team assignments; A task management system that enables you to assign tasks, projects, set priorities, and deadlines; Use AI Autofill to generate summaries, tasks, and more; A roadmap calendar view for tracking important dates and events; A project overview section to keep a bird's eye view of the full project scope and post-mortem; A resource and notes library for storing project-related files, documents, and notes; How to download the template?Open the template link and click "Duplicate" in the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.; Does this template work on the free version of Notion?Yes, all you need is a free Notion account plan.; Is it permissible to share this with others?Unfortunately not. This product comes with a personal use license. If you know someone who might benefit from it, kindly refer them.; May I reach out with some questions?Please do! Always available to discuss any questions and help out. Don't hesitate to reach out!
